title: Sane schema migrations with Alembic and SQLAlchemy
summary: Working with developers on schema migrations is a perennial challenge for DBAs and developers. Devs tend to like a "set it and forget it" tool. This talk discusses the strategies used to move from a pure SQL and shell migration system to using SQLAlchemy and alembic for maximum DBA and developer happiness.
